Bunny vs Snake Game Instructions:
1.The bunny runs continuously from right to left.
2.A snake will chase the bunny from the right side of the screen.
3.Your goal is to click the snake to kill it before it reaches the bunny.
4.Be careful! Only one snake appears at a time, but if the bunny crosses the left edge, a new snake will spawn from the right — it could still reach the bunny if not killed.
5.Do not click the bunny by mistake, or it will die.
